Fox and Friends allow lunatic Christian pastor Jerry Falwell, Jr. to imply that coronavirus might be a bioweapon created by North Korea's Kim Jong-Un to attack the United States. David Pakman discusses this appearance by Falwell Jr. and Fox's reckless reaction. "Every aspect of this appearance is weaponized ignorance and it's irresponsible," he says. The David Pakman Show is a news and political talk program, known for its controversial interviews with political and religious extremists, liberal and conservative politicians, and other guests.
